title: (x) Indiana Jones and The Last Crusade movie logo - SF Fedora {Jan E}
content:
Can you ID _Last Crusade._

[http://spyhunter007.com/Images/indiana\_jones\_and\_the\_last\_crusade2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119052605/http:/spyhunter007.com/Images/indiana_jones_and_the_last_crusade2.jpg "http://spyhunter007.com/Images/indiana\_jones\_and\_the\_last\_crusade2.jpg")

side not: In illustrator is there a way other than envelope to create the _Indiana Jones_ title ?

 [‹ (x) "Helion AG" logo semi serif - Jaguar JC {Angel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119052605/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32935 "Go to previous forum topic") [Virgin script ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119052605/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36241 "Go to next forum topic")
author: zzi

comments.content:
If you just need something similar:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/burger-joint/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119052605/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/burger-joint/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/burger-joint/")  
is pretty close. Just need to slant it.

Ralf

Derek Vogelpohl (Shyfonts) did some fonts like that:  
Comic Script:  
 [http://moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/shyfonts/shy\_c.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119052605/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/shyfonts/shy_c.htm "http://moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/shyfonts/shy\_c.htm")  
Fedora:  
 [http://moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/shyfonts/shy\_f.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119052605/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/shyfonts/shy_f.htm "http://moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/shyfonts/shy\_f.htm")

I tried that Indiana Jones look once using Comic Script.  
It needed a little twisting:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119052605im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/AbenteuerReihe_3717.jpg)
  
I did it manually.

Comic Script:
http://moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/shyfonts/shy_c.htm And the SF Chaerilida on the same page is exactly the font you need for “Last Crusade”. And it’s even free. Ralf
Well, Fedora is obviously meant to be an Indiana Jones package. Hm. Brackets for Ralf. OK.
Thank you. Gentleman. It tuned out great.

Well, Fedora is obviously meant to be an Indiana Jones package. Hm. Brackets for Ralf.
 Oh, sorry. Haven’t checked your second link after seeing the fonts on the first one. Ralf
